A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The filter of fond\, young memories is likely a harsh lens through which to rate a movie. Nothing will ever match my awe in watching AT-ATs lumber across the frozen hills of Hoth for the first time\, so many years ago. I enjoyed many parts of this movie. Others\, not so much. My personal hated be bit was Luke and the lightsaber. When you see it\, you will know. I could write much here\, but will leave it short. There are better SW films. And there are much worse. I still enjoy this universe and will continue to see what the next auteur brings to the screen.
